20110116160100.000|20110116160109.000|CC1|THE ST. ODILIA                  
20110116160109.000|20110116160110.000|CC1|CATHOLIC CHURCH IN TUCSON,      
20110116160110.000|20110116160110.000|CC1|ARIZONA, SO CLOSE TO THE SCENE  
20110116160110.000|20110116160111.000|CC1|OF LAST WEEK'S TRAGIC EVENTS    
20110116160111.000|20110116160112.000|CC1|THAT YOU COULD ACTUALLY HEAR THE
20110116160112.000|20110116160113.000|CC1|SHOTS RING OUT FROM THIS HALL.  
20110116160113.000|20110116160114.000|CC1|A WEEK AGO A GROUP OF PEOPLE    
20110116160114.000|20110116160114.000|CC1|GATHERED IN A SUPERMARKET       
20110116160114.000|20110116160115.000|CC1|PARKING LOT TO DO THE MOST      
20110116160115.000|20110116160116.000|CC1|AMERICAN OF THINGS, TO MEET WITH
20110116160116.000|20110116160117.000|CC1|THEIR ELECTED REPRESENTATIVE, TO
20110116160117.000|20110116160118.000|CC1|SHARE WHAT WAS ON THEIR MINDS.

20110116160119.000|20110116160121.000|CC1|MORNING A CRIME SCENE.          
20110116160121.000|20110116160123.000|CC1|THE MEETING PRECISELY ONE WEEK  
20110116160123.000|20110116160125.000|CC1|AGO WAS BRUTALLY CUT SHORT.     
20110116160125.000|20110116160127.000|CC1|AND SO I'M HERE ALONG WITH MY   
20110116160127.000|20110116160128.000|CC1|COLLEAGUE DAVID MUIR TO GATHER  
20110116160128.000|20110116160130.000|CC1|TOGETHER FOR THE FIRST TIME     
20110116160130.000|20110116160132.000|CC1|SINCE THAT DAY SO MANY OF THE   
20110116160132.000|20110116160133.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO WERE THERE ON THE

20110116160216.000|20110116160218.000|CC1|BILL BADGER.

20110116160220.000|20110116160223.000|CC1|HER BECAUSE OF HER WILLINGNESS

20110116160230.000|20110116160233.000|CC1|A LOCAL SUPERMARKET.            
20110116160233.000|20110116160235.000|CC1|NO ONE REALLY THOUGHT IT WOULD  
20110116160235.000|20110116160237.000|CC1|DRAW A BIG CROWD, BUT SOMEHOW IT
20110116160237.000|20110116160238.000|CC1|DID GET THE ATTENTION OF A      
20110116160238.000|20110116160242.000|CC1|9-YEAR-OLD GIRL WILLING TO      
20110116160242.000|20110116160243.000|CC1|FORFEIT SATURDAY MORNING

20110116160243.000|20110116160245.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS JUMPING UP AND DOWN  
20110116160245.000|20110116160246.000|CC1|AND SHE KEPT SAYING, I'M NEXT,  
20110116160246.000|20110116160248.000|CC1|I'M NEXT.

20110116160249.000|20110116160250.000|CC1|WHO'D ONLY BE ON GIFFORDS' STAFF
20110116160250.000|20110116160254.000|CC1|FOR FIVE DAYS.                  
20110116160254.000|20110116160255.000|CC1|>> LOTS OF PEOPLE

20110116160308.000|20110116160311.000|CC1|GIFFORDS WAS ASKED TO RECITE    
20110116160311.000|20110116160313.000|CC1|PART OF THE FIRST AMENDMENT, THE
20110116160313.000|20110116160315.000|CC1|ONE GUARANTEEING ALL AMERICANS

20110116160321.000|20110116160322.000|CC1|REASONABLE PEOPLE LIKE SUPPORTER

20110116160328.000|20110116160331.000|CC1|IT'S A VERY SAD TIME IN OUR     
20110116160331.000|20110116160333.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20110116160333.000|20110116160335.000|CC1|>> BUT THAT SATURDAY MORNING    
20110116160335.000|20110116160337.000|CC1|LAST WEEK, A TAXICAB PULLED INTO
20110116160337.000|20110116160338.000|CC1|THIS SAFEWAY PARKING LOT        
20110116160338.000|20110116160339.000|CC1|CARRYING A MAN WITH A TWISTED   
20110116160339.000|20110116160346.000|CC1|VIEW.                           
20110116160346.000|20110116160348.000|CC1|>> A KIND OF SHADY-LOOKING      
20110116160348.000|20110116160349.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN CAME UP AND           
20110116160349.000|20110116160350.000|CC1|BEFORE I KNEW,                  
20110116160350.000|20110116160351.000|CC1|HE WAS BARGING THROUGH THE      
20110116160351.000|20110116160351.000|CC1|TABLES IN FRONT OF THE          
20110116160351.000|20110116160352.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN.                  
20110116160352.000|20110116160353.000|CC1|>> A MAN WHO SEEMED TO BE AT WAR
20110116160353.000|20110116160354.000|CC1|WITH NORMAL.                    
20110116160354.000|20110116160355.000|CC1|>> I LOOKED OVER, AND IT WAS    
20110116160355.000|20110116160356.000|CC1|JUST BANG, BANG, BANG, BANG,    
20110116160356.000|20110116160400.000|CC1|BANG, BANG.                     
20110116160400.000|20110116160402.000|CC1|>> THE GUY HAD A SEMIAUTOMATIC  
20110116160402.000|20110116160402.000|CC1|PISTOL.                         
20110116160402.000|20110116160404.000|CC1|HE JUST WENT IN AND STARTED     
20110116160404.000|20110116160407.000|CC1|FIRING AND THEN RAN.            
20110116160407.000|20110116160408.000|CC1|>> WE HEARD PEOPLE YELLING, GET 
20110116160408.000|20110116160409.000|CC1|THE GUN.                        
20110116160409.000|20110116160410.000|CC1|THERE HE IS.                    
20110116160410.000|20110116160410.000|CC1|>> IS ANYBODY INJURED?          
20110116160410.000|20110116160410.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:04:00 of 1:00:00
20110116160410.000|20110116160411.000|CC1|DID YOU SAY GABRIELLE GIFFORDS  
20110116160411.000|20110116160412.000|CC1|WAS HIT?                        
20110116160412.000|20110116160412.000|CC1|>> SHE'S HIT.                   
20110116160412.000|20110116160413.000|CC1|>> I WAS ABOUT THREE FEET FROM  
20110116160413.000|20110116160414.000|CC1|HER.

20110116160416.000|20110116160417.000|CC1|THE LINE OF FIRE.               
20110116160417.000|20110116160419.000|CC1|I WAS SHAKEN TO MY CORE.        
20110116160419.000|20110116160422.000|CC1|>> WE NEED MORE THAN ONE        
20110116160422.000|20110116160425.000|CC1|AMBULANCE.                      
20110116160425.000|20110116160425.000|CC1|THERE'S MORE THAN ONE PERSON    
20110116160425.000|20110116160426.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20110116160426.000|20110116160427.000|CC1|>> I SAW A MAN WITH A GUN SHOOT 
20110116160427.000|20110116160428.000|CC1|HER IN THE HEAD AND THEN        
20110116160428.000|20110116160428.000|CC1|CONTINUE FIRING POINT BLANK AT  
20110116160428.000|20110116160430.000|CC1|EVERYBODY WHO WAS IN THE AREA   
20110116160430.000|20110116160434.000|CC1|AND THERE WAS REALLY NOWHERE TO 
20110116160434.000|20110116160435.000|CC1|RUN.                            
20110116160435.000|20110116160436.000|CC1|>> MY HUSBAND JUST CALLED       
20110116160436.000|20110116160437.000|CC1|ME AND TOLD ME HE WAS SHOT.     
20110116160437.000|20110116160438.000|CC1|HE WENT TO THE GABRIELLE        
20110116160438.000|20110116160439.000|CC1|GIFFORDS --                     
20110116160439.000|20110116160439.000|CC1|>> YOUR HUSBAND WAS SHOT?       
20110116160439.000|20110116160440.000|CC1|>> THAT'S WHAT HE SAID AND THEN 
20110116160440.000|20110116160441.000|CC1|THE PHONE WENT DEAD.            
20110116160441.000|20110116160442.000|CC1|>> HE WAS PULLING A MAGAZINE OUT
20110116160442.000|20110116160445.000|CC1|OF HIS PANTS POCKET WITH HIS    
20110116160445.000|20110116160446.000|CC1|LEFT HAND, AND I WAS ABLE TO    
20110116160446.000|20110116160450.000|CC1|GRAB THE MAGAZINE.              
20110116160450.000|20110116160451.000|CC1|>> AND WHEN WE PUSHED HIM, HE   
20110116160451.000|20110116160451.000|CC1|JUST WENT RIGHT TO THE GROUND.  
20110116160451.000|20110116160452.000|CC1|I HAD TO DO SOMETHING.          
20110116160452.000|20110116160453.000|CC1|I JUST COULDN'T SIT THERE AND   
20110116160453.000|20110116160455.000|CC1|LET THIS GUY GO ON.             
20110116160455.000|20110116160457.000|CC1|>> THE LOSS OF THESE WONDERFUL  
20110116160457.000|20110116160500.000|CC1|PEOPLE SHOULD MAKE EVERY ONE OF 
20110116160500.000|20110116160505.000|CC1|US STRIVE TO BE BETTER, TO BE   
20110116160505.000|20110116160505.000|CC1|BETTER IN OUR PRIVATE LIVES.    
20110116160505.000|20110116160506.000|CC1|THEIR DEATH HELPS USHER IN MORE 
20110116160506.000|20110116160507.000|CC1|CIVILITY IN OUR PUBLIC          
20110116160507.000|20110116160509.000|CC1|DISCOURSE.                      
20110116160509.000|20110116160512.000|CC1|>> BY MIDWEEK PRESIDENT OBAMA   
20110116160513.000|20110116160513.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:05:00 of 1:00:00
20110116160512.000|20110116160514.000|CC1|CAME HERE TO TUCSON TO TRY TO   
20110116160514.000|20110116160517.000|CC1|HEAL THE FRESH WOUNDS OF THE    
20110116160517.000|20110116160518.000|CC1|GRIEVING AND CONFUSED COMMUNITY,
20110116160518.000|20110116160519.000|CC1|TO HONOR THE FALLEN AND TO TRY  
20110116160519.000|20110116160522.000|CC1|TO UNIFY THE COUNTRY.           
20110116160522.000|20110116160523.000|CC1|>> LET US REMEMBER IT IS NOT    
20110116160523.000|20110116160527.000|CC1|BECAUSE A SIMPLE LACK OF        
20110116160527.000|20110116160530.000|CC1|CIVILITY CAUSED THIS TRAGEDY, IT
20110116160530.000|20110116160532.000|CC1|DID NOT, BUT RATHER BECAUSE ONLY
20110116160532.000|20110116160536.000|CC1|A MORE CIVIL AND HONEST PUBLIC  
20110116160536.000|20110116160539.000|CC1|DISCOURSE CAN HELP US FACE UP TO
20110116160539.000|20110116160540.000|CC1|THE CHALLENGES OF OUR NATION IN 
20110116160540.000|20110116160540.000|CC1|A WAY THAT WOULD MAKE THEM      
20110116160540.000|20110116160546.000|CC1|PROUD.                          
20110116160546.000|20110116160547.000|CC1|>> AND SO SATURDAY MORNING AS   
20110116160547.000|20110116160549.000|CC1|THE SCENE OF THE CRIME BECAME   
20110116160549.000|20110116160550.000|CC1|JUST THE SAFEWAY PARKING LOT    
20110116160550.000|20110116160553.000|CC1|ONCE AGAIN AND TUCSON OBSERVED A
20110116160553.000|20110116160554.000|CC1|MOMENT OF SILENCE A WEEK TO THE 
20110116160554.000|20110116160556.000|CC1|MINUTE THE SHOOTINGS TOOK PLACE,
20110116160556.000|20110116160558.000|CC1|WE BROUGHT TOGETHER THE         
20110116160558.000|20110116160600.000|CC1|COMMUNITY OF PEOPLE MOST CLOSELY
20110116160600.000|20110116160607.000|CC1|AFFECTED BY THIS TERRIBLE CRIME 
20110116160607.000|20110116160608.000|CC1|FOR A SPECIAL TOWN MEETING,     
20110116160608.000|20110116160609.000|CC1|"AFTER THE TRAGEDY: AN AMERICAN 
20110116160609.000|20110116160610.000|CC1|CONVERSATION CONTINUES."        
20110116160610.000|20110116160610.000|CC1|WE HOPE TO BEGIN THE HONEST     
20110116160610.000|20110116160611.000|CC1|DISCOURSE THE PRESIDENT ASKED   
20110116160611.000|20110116160614.000|CC1|FOR IN HIS SPEECH.              
20110116160616.000|20110116160616.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 1:00:00
20110116160614.000|20110116160618.000|CC1|WE THANK THE CONGREGATION OF    
20110116160618.000|20110116160619.000|CC1|ST. ODILIA FOR HOSTING US, THE  
20110116160619.000|20110116160622.000|CC1|HOME PARISH OF TWO OF THOSE     
20110116160622.000|20110116160625.000|CC1|WHO WERE KILLED IN THE SHOOTING.
20110116160625.000|20110116160626.000|CC1|9-YEAR-OLD CHRISTINA TAYLOR     
20110116160626.000|20110116160628.000|CC1|GREEN HAD HER FIRST COMMUNION   
20110116160628.000|20110116160629.000|CC1|HERE, AND JUDGE JOHN ROLL GREW  
20110116160629.000|20110116160631.000|CC1|UP IN THIS PARISH, AS WELL.     
20110116160631.000|20110116160634.000|CC1|WHAT I WANT TO ASK ALL OF YOU   
20110116160634.000|20110116160635.000|CC1|FIRST IS BY A SHOW OF HANDS TO  
20110116160635.000|20110116160638.000|CC1|TELL ME HOW MANY OF YOU WERE    
20110116160638.000|20110116160640.000|CC1|EITHER INVOLVED AT THAT FATEFUL 
20110116160640.000|20110116160642.000|CC1|PLACE AT THE SAFEWAY OR WHETHER 
20110116160642.000|20110116160645.000|CC1|YOU WERE INVOLVED AT THE        
20110116160645.000|20110116160646.000|CC1|HOSPITAL AFTERWARDS OR IN THE   
20110116160646.000|20110116160648.000|CC1|IMMEDIATE AFTERMATH OR WHETHER  
20110116160648.000|20110116160650.000|CC1|YOU KNOW ANYBODY WHO WAS        
20110116160650.000|20110116160653.000|CC1|INVOLVED IN THAT TRAGIC         
20110116160653.000|20110116160654.000|CC1|SHOOTING.                       
20110116160654.000|20110116160656.000|CC1|SHOW ME BY A SHOW OF HANDS.     
20110116160656.000|20110116160659.000|CC1|SO PRACTICALLY THE WHOLE ROOM.  
20110116160659.000|20110116160702.000|CC1|THIS WHOLE COMMUNITY HAS BEEN SO
20110116160702.000|20110116160703.000|CC1|TOUCHED, AND I THINK I WANT TO  
20110116160703.000|20110116160705.000|CC1|ASK YOU, BILL HEILMAN, WHAT IS  
20110116160705.000|20110116160710.000|CC1|THE LASTING IMPRESSION THAT YOU 
20110116160710.000|20110116160711.000|CC1|WILL TAKE AWAY FROM THAT DAY?

20110116165618.000|20110116165620.000|CC1|   TOUGH FOR ME AND MY FAMILY.  
20110116165620.000|20110116165620.000|CC1|     I WAS LIVING ON WELFARE

20110116165622.000|20110116165623.000|CC1| AFTER I GOT THE JOB AT WALMART,
